alert.note: Alert for Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 5:09PM CDT until May 27 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Cross County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 509 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marked Tree, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Marked Tree, Tyronza, Payneway, Wiley Crossing, Tulot, Weona Junction, Weona, Stewart, Dub, Twist, Boat Run, Cassidy, Bay Village, Coldwater, Northern Ohio, Old Weona, Wilbeth, Judd Hill and Monterey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
